name: mcp-xpp-server
description: MCP server for Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations X++ development. Browse, create, modify, delete, search, and analyze D365 objects through intelligent tooling integrated with VS2022 extension APIs.
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server for D365 F&O development that provides 12 specialized tools for managing X++ objects. Features include object creation (544+ types), form creation with pattern support, batch modifications, object inspection with X++ source extraction, fast SQLite-based search indexing, and label management. Connects to a companion C# .NET service via Named Pipes for real Microsoft.Dynamics.AX.Metadata API integration.

tools.name: create_xpp_object
tools.description: Browse all 544+ available D365 F&O object types or create objects (classes, tables, enums, data entities, etc.) using VS2022 service integration.

tools.name: create_form
tools.description: Create D365 forms with advanced pattern support, datasource integration, and form pattern discovery.

tools.name: delete_xpp_object
tools.description: Safely delete D365 F&O objects with dependency validation and cascade deletion support.

tools.name: find_xpp_object
tools.description: Find and analyze X++ objects (classes, tables, forms, etc.) by name, validating existence in the codebase.

tools.name: inspect_xpp_object
tools.description: Advanced object inspection with summary-first architecture, targeted properties, collection browsing, and X++ source code extraction.

tools.name: build_object_index
tools.description: Build or update the SQLite object index for faster searches across the D365 codebase.

tools.name: get_current_config
tools.description: Get server configuration with flexible detail levels including model info and available object types.

tools.name: search_objects_pattern
tools.description: Search D365 objects by name pattern using wildcards, or browse all objects in a specific model.

tools.name: discover_modification_capabilities
tools.description: Discover available modification methods for any D365 object type using real-time reflection.

tools.name: execute_object_modification
tools.description: Execute batch D365 object modifications with per-operation tracking and detailed error reporting.

tools.name: get_label
tools.description: Get D365 F&O label text by label ID from local metadata files with multi-language support.

tools.name: get_labels_batch
tools.description: Retrieve multiple D365 F&O label texts efficiently in a single request with multi-language support.

xpp_path.title: PackagesLocalDirectory Path
xpp_path.description: Path to the D365 Finance & Operations PackagesLocalDirectory (e.g., K:\AosService\PackagesLocalDirectory). If not provided, the server will attempt to get this from the VS2022 service automatically.

xpp_metadata_folder.title: Custom Metadata Output Path
xpp_metadata_folder.description: Path where newly created D365 objects will be written. If not provided, the server will use the default location from the VS2022 service.

vs2022_extension_path.title: VS2022 D365 Extension Path
vs2022_extension_path.description: Path to the Visual Studio 2022 D365 Finance & Operations extension directory. Auto-detected if not provided.
